channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2024031300
item.description:
Report X-2024031300

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-22
  • City: SCHENECTADY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler was unloading trailer and noticed side of Hazmat was wet, brought it to manager's attention who called QA department. QA brought package to processing area for processing and containment, package found to be leaking from body seam of jug. DescribePack: Seam dented in due to too much movement in box, leaked all over package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package contained in Haz tote with fold absorb to absorb any additional leakage.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WENT TO SORT AISLE FOR LEAKING PACKAGE, FOUND FLAMMABLE LIQUID BOX WITH WET SIDES, BOTTOM. RESPONDER USED DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE RESPONSE SHEET TO CHECK FOR HAZARDS, USED ZEP ZORBANT IN LINED SPILL TRAY TO TRANSPORT TO DAMAGE CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024031263
item.description:
Report X-2024031263

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-20
  • City: LONG ISLAND CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During our inbound sort, a hazmat package was being unloaded from a van when it was dropped. This caused a bend in one of the bottles in the package but also the cap on another bottle came off and the contents of the bottle leaked out of its container. The package was gathered to a safe space and the spillage was contained. DescribePack: The cap on the bottle came off causing the bottle to leak its contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Kitty litter was placed on the floor where the spillage took place and safety precautions were maintained alerting employees passing by.

item.title: Report X-2024031231
item.description:
Report X-2024031231

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-20
  • City: BUFFALO
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During preload sort on 03/20/2023, a fully regulated Hazmat package was discovered to be leaking contents. Package then taken to QA for further inspection DescribePack: Upon inspection of package, it was discovered that a five gallon bucket of Aqua-Org Plus Superior Quality Calcium Hypochlorite Granules was cracked and leaking and leaking contents from bottom of plastic bucket DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Damaged package placed in red plastic Fedex Ground Hazmat bin with plastic liner and staged in Hazmat cage on site for future processing by QA

item.title: Report X-2024031185
item.description:
Report X-2024031185

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-29T18:14:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-19
  • City: BRONX
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought from the unload and placed on the rollers. Package fell off the Hytro which bent the paint can the lid came loose and caused spillage. DescribePack: Package fell off the Hytro and bent the paint can which caused the cover to come loose, and paint leaked. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was contained in a hazmat bin.

item.title: Report I-2024020042
item.description:
Report I-2024020042

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-27T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-07
  • City: JAMAICA
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: American Airlines Priority Parcel
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment 001-57807886 was tendered by Sky Courier on 2/7. The airway bill commodity section was listed as aircraft part. The driver was asked if there were any batteries and he responded no, just an aircraft part. The security screener x-rayed the piece and saw what looked like batteries. He opened the package and saw that it was batteries for an Emergency locator transmitter ( EL T ). These Lithium Ion aircraft batteries are prohibited for carriage as cargo or COMA T on passenger aircraft.
